thread.title: Give Blood Or Go To Jail, Judge Tells Defendants Who Can't Afford Fines
thread.title_full: Give Blood Or Go To Jail, Judge Tells Defendants Who Can't Afford Fines

title: Give Blood Or Go To Jail, Judge Tells Defendants Who Can't Afford Fines
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Crime - Today 
An Alabama judge has been accused of running roughshod over protections for poor defendants by ordering some to give blood or get locked up...
